name: IOTIQSmartHome
0:
”Alexa Turn off Fan”
”Alexa Set fan speed to 3”
”Alexa, Set Ac temperature to 18”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With this skill People can control all there IOTIQ controlled smart home appliances. 
People need to buy IOTIQ Smart Home products Like - IOTIQ 4 Node Swicth, IOTIQ 3 Node Switch, IOTIQ Power or IOTIQ Red. 
After installing and configuring these products in the IOTIQ Mobile application you can link your account to this skill. 
After linking you can use alexa voice interface to control any of those devices like turning on or off, setting fan speeds or changing channels on TV etc..
